name: eidolon
description: Desktop AI assistant with chat, writing studio, and image generation
author: Jeff Kazzee

scripts.dev: concurrently "bun run dev:shared" "bun run dev:desktop" "bun run dev:web"
scripts.build: bun run build:shared && bun run build:desktop && bun run build:web
scripts.lint: bun run lint:shared && bun run lint:desktop && bun run lint:web
scripts.test: bun run test:shared && bun run test:desktop && bun run test:web
scripts.clean: cd packages/shared && bun run clean && cd ../../apps/desktop && bun run clean && cd ../web && bun run clean
